alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Musselshell (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 5:10PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Musselshell and east central Golden Valley Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 508 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 16 miles east of Ryegate, or 20 miles southwest of Roundup, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain, winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rain will cause ponding of water on roadways and in low-lying areas. Locations impacted include... Lavina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
